47806.summary: Some customers in Michipicoten and Wawa are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47806.title: Mar 20 - Michipicoten and Wawa | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.

47840.summary: Some customers in the Kelsey Woodlawn area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47840.title: Mar 20 - Saskatoon (Kelsey Woodlawn) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
